AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: street rat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood roaming around the streets of the Imperial City slums. Life was never easy, but [PAWN_nameDef] learned quickly that there were many ways to get some septims in order to survive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: mage's apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] studied as a mage's apprentice in the Imperial City at the Arcane UNiversity. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days and nights studying old tomes, trying to find what spells would be mightier than others, but as most apprentices they spent long hours cleaning and doing their masters bidding .

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: house servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a servant for a wealthy merchant. [PAWN_pronoun] cooked, cleaned, and handled the daily affairs of the manor. [PAWN_nameDef] would look out to the Bay of Nibenay in awe of one day becoming rich as well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Imperial noble
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into nobility. [PAWN_pronoun] has lived a life of ease and is used to getting [PAWN_possessive] way, but [PAWN_possessive] status has also brought forth more responsibility including training in the social and military arts.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rice fieldhand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] parents owned a large rice farm, as one of the children of farmers working as a fieldhand was expected. [PAWN_pronoun] is used to hard manual labor and has developed quite the love of plants in the process.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Imperial village child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in one of the many villages dotted around Cyrodiil. [PAWN_pronoun] learned simple skills in and found work when it was needed be it herding animals or cleaning up the smiths tools.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alchemist's assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been working in an alchemist's shop. [PAWN_pronoun] has been taught about all sorts of plants and alchemical ingrediants found throughout Tamriel.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mythic dawn child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] parents were members of the mythic dawn cult. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained by [PAWN_possessive] parents to obey and worship Mehrunes Dagon from a young age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Divine temple attendant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood worshiping in the Temple of the nine divines. [PAWN_pronoun] made sure all the shrines were well polished and that the pews and alters were well maintained and had suitable offerings as well. [PAWN_nameDef] learned a lot from the priests and priestess's.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: ship's mate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has grown up cleaning and serving on various ships, be it a merchant or military vessel.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: fighters' guild trainee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a trainee in the Fighters' Guild. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught by the Guild how to hold [PAWN_possessive] own in personal combat, to hold [PAWN_possessive] weapon with confidence and dispatch [PAWN_possessive] enemies without prejudice.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: shopkeep's assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up tending a shop in the market district of the Imperial City. [PAWN_pronoun] always made sure that everything was in tip top shape and in perfect order. [PAWN_nameDef] never turned down an opportunity to make some septims.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: blacksmith's apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] apprenticed to a blacksmith in their city. [PAWN_pronoun] was in charge of cleaning the tools and making sure the forge never ran out of material.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Stable hand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a stable and grew up raising horses their whole life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Aylied history student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has decided to study the ancient ruins left by the Aylieds. [PAWN_possessive] has grown an uneasy fascination with the ancientrace and [PAWN_possessive] nose in the books, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned all about the first rebellion of humans and the glory in which the Empire was founded.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bandit child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into life of petty banditry. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up on the run from the Imperial watch or at times the occasional citizen with a pitchfork.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: young adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been interested in becoming a hero of legend. As soon as [PAWN_pronoun] was able to afford a blade and decent set of armor, [PAWN_pronoun] left their home in Anvil and went to make their mark on the world.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: healer-in-training
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked [PAWN_possessive] early life training to be a healer. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught to lay hands on the weak and mix potions at the mages guild in Anvil.
